allow: Bash(pwsh -NoProfile -Command "try { . .\\deploy.ps1 -ErrorAction Stop; Write-Host ''Syntax OK'' } catch { Write-Host $_Exception.Message }")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate Area table to V2 schema with payload pattern

- Add AreaPayload.cs with Style, Terminology, Contacts, and Polygon
- Add AreaEntityV2.cs for V2-only columns when saving
- Update AreaEntity with GetPayload/SetPayload, schema versioning, and auto-migration
- Update TableStorageAreaRepository with DeleteAndAddAsV2Async pattern
- Update all code accessing Area properties to use GetPayload\(\)

Also includes various other pending changes:
- Event, Location schema migrations
- Layers feature
- Sample events functionality
- Map and UI improvements
- Deploy script updates
- Removal of deprecated AdminUser and UserEventMapping tables

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add start/finish notes for marshals in sample event

Create a note visible to all marshals at checkpoints in the Start/Finish
area with residential area guidelines, traffic management info, and local
pub hot chocolate offer.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
